pages.contacts: Contacts - FlowStore About us Our team Contacts FAQs Contact Us Get in touch with FlowStore today for all your floral needs. Whether you have a question, need assistance, or want to place an order, our team is here to help. Reach out to us and let us help you bring beauty into your life. Contact Now Contact Us Need to get in touch? Feel free to contact FlowStore for any inquiries, orders, or assistance. We're here to help you with all your floral needs. Plus, enjoy our fast and reliable delivery service to ensure your blooms arrive fresh and beautiful every time. India Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062, India +91-725-6237312 flowstore@gmail.com Contact Use I agree with the privacy policy FAQ What types of flowers do you offer? At FlowStore, we offer a diverse selection of flowers ranging from classic roses, elegant lilies, vibrant tulips, exotic orchids, to seasonal blooms like sunflowers and daisies. Our collection is carefully curated to ensure freshness, quality, and variety. Do you provide delivery services? Yes, FlowStore provides reliable and efficient delivery services to ensure your flowers arrive fresh and beautiful, whether you're sending them as a gift or decorating your own space. We offer same-day and next-day delivery options for your convenience. Can I customize my flower arrangement? Absolutely! We understand that every occasion is unique, and we offer customizable flower arrangements to suit your specific preferences and requirements. Whether you prefer a traditional bouquet, a modern floral design, or a custom centerpiece, our experienced florists will work closely with you to create the perfect arrangement. How can I track my order? Once your order has been dispatched, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this tracking number to monitor the status of your delivery and ensure that your flowers arrive on time. Home Contacts Privacy policy Terms of Use
pages.index: FlowStore - Color Shop About us Our team Contacts FAQs Welcome to FlowStore Discover the vibrant world of flowers at FlowStore, your premier destination for exquisite blooms in India. From traditional favorites to exotic rarities, our carefully curated selection offers something for every occasion and taste. Explore Now About FlowStore Our Passion for Flowers At FlowStore, our passion for flowers drives everything we do. We believe in the power of blooms to uplift spirits, evoke emotions, and create unforgettable moments. With a commitment to quality and creativity, we strive to bring the beauty of nature into every home and heart. Our Commitment to Excellence FlowStore is dedicated to excellence in every aspect of our business. From sourcing the freshest blooms to providing exceptional customer service, we go above and beyond to ensure your floral experience with us is nothing short of extraordinary. Discover the FlowStore difference today. About FlowStore FlowStore is not just a flower shop; it's a symbol of beauty, elegance, and tradition. Founded with a passion for blooms and a commitment to excellence, FlowStore has blossomed into India's premier destination for exquisite floral arrangements. Our journey began with a simple mission: to spread joy and celebrate life's special moments through the language of flowers. Today, we stand proud as a trusted name in the industry, serving customers across the nation with the freshest blooms and unparalleled service. At FlowStore, we believe in the power of flowers to inspire, uplift, and transform. Whether you're expressing love, conveying sympathy, or simply brightening someone's day, our carefully crafted arrangements speak volumes without saying a word. Expertly Crafted Arrangements Fresh, Handpicked Blooms Personalized Service Timely Delivery Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed Exquisite Floral Designs for Every Occasion Unmatched Quality and Attention to Detail Our History From humble beginnings to a renowned floral powerhouse, FlowStore's journey is a testament to dedication, passion, and vision. Founded in 2019, we've grown from a small boutique to a nationwide phenomenon, spreading happiness one bouquet at a time. Our Mission FlowStore is on a mission to redefine the art of gifting with our stunning floral creations. We strive to make every moment memorable, every gesture meaningful, and every flower arrangement a masterpiece. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal. Our Values At FlowStore, integrity, creativity, and excellence are more than just words; they're the foundation of everything we do. We take pride in our work, treat every customer with respect, and never compromise on quality. Experience the FlowStore difference today. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - FlowStore About us Our team Contacts FAQs Privacy Policy At FlowStore, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website. Information We Collect When you visit our website, we may collect certain information automatically, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, and browsing behavior. We may also use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, although you can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer. In addition, we may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and postal address, when you place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us through our website. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for various purposes, including: Processing and fulfilling your orders; Providing customer support and responding to your inquiries; Sending you updates, newsletters, and promotional offers; Improving our products, services, and website; Analyzing trends and preferences to enhance your user experience; Preventing fraud and ensuring the security of our website. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. However, we may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving you. Security Measures We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Our website is secured with SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) encryption to ensure the security of your data during transmission. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Children's Privacy Our website is not directed to children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are under 13 years of age, please do not provide any personal information on our website. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at flowstore@gmail.com. Home Contacts Privacy policy Terms of Use
pages.terms: Terms of Use - FlowStore About us Our team Contacts FAQs Terms of Service Welcome to FlowStore! These Terms of Service outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website. Use of Our Website You may use our website for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these Terms of Service. You agree not to: Use our website in any way that violates any applicable laws or regulations; Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity; Interfere with or disrupt the operation of our website or servers; Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our website, accounts, or computer systems; Engage in any activity that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our website or interfere with other users' enjoyment of our website. Intellectual Property Rights All content included on our website, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of FlowStore or its licensors and is protected by copyright laws. Limitation of Liability In no event shall FlowStore, its directors, officers, employees, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website. Changes to These Terms We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms of Service at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage you to review these terms periodically for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us at flowstore@gmail.com.
